Texto: 
none available
contrast enhanced ct images demonstrates an approximately 4cm heterogeneously enhancing mass, arising exophytically from the posterior cortex, interpolar region of the right kidney. the mass contains a large amount of macroscopic fat.
angiomyolipoma
angiomyolipoma
rarely, renal cell carcionoma or oncocytoma
asymptomatic, needed follow up of an incidental finding made on ultrasound.
